about_us.welcome_message: Welcome to E-golden – your trusted partner for relocation to Portugal.
about_us.who_we_are: At E-golden, we specialize in providing comprehensive relocation services tailored to the unique needs of our clients. The idea to create E-golden stemmed from the challenges we identified that people wanting to move to Portugal face. Therefore, combining our experience in providing the necessary services, and after having gone through a similar process ourselves, the founders of E-golden, we welcome the opportunity to help as many people as possible to have the best and most comfortable experience in their relocation process.
about_us.our_mission: Our mission is to provide top-notch relocation services that exceed customer expectations. We aim to minimize downtime and disruptions, enabling a smooth transition to new locations and resumption of activities as quickly as possible.
about_us.our_vision: Our vision is to be the leading provider of relocation services worldwide, recognized for our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction. Our goal is to set new standards in the relocation industry, ensuring that every move is a step forward for our clients.

our_values.integrity: We conduct our business to the highest ethical standards, ensuring transparency and honesty in all our dealings.
our_values.customer_focus: Our customers are at the center of everything we do. We strive to understand their unique needs and provide personalized solutions.
our_values.excellence: We are committed to delivering exceptional service and continuously improving our processes to exceed customer expectations.
our_values.teamwork: We believe in the power of collaboration and work together to achieve common goals.
our_values.innovation: We embrace new ideas and technologies to provide the best services to our customers.

residency_relocation.title: Relocation and Residency
description: Are you thinking about moving to a different country? Portugal will be the right place to fulfil your dreams and needs.
We can tailor a package of services perfectly suited to your exact needs, including residency permits, tax advice, home search, opening bank account, health insurance, driving license, and others.

details.label: Residency Permits
details.description: Residency permits in Portugal provide a pathway to a new life in one of Europe's most desirable destinations. Whether through investment, employment, or family ties, Portugal offers a range of options for individuals seeking to establish residency in this beautiful country. With its welcoming atmosphere, rich culture, and stunning landscapes, Portugal truly is a gateway to European living. Obtaining residency in Portugal comes with a host of benefits. Beyond the opportunity to live in a safe and welcoming country with a high standard of living, residents also have access to Portugal's excellent healthcare and education systems. Additionally, residency in Portugal grants access to the wider Schengen Area, allowing for visa-free travel throughout much of Europe.

tax-planning-advice.title: Tax Planning and advice
description: Understanding your tax obligations and its impact on your personal life and business is essential when you decide to relocate or invest in a new country.

details.title: Tax Planning and Advice
details.description: Tax planning is essential for any Company or Entrepreneur whose objective is to prosper in the development of their business. The decision to invest in a business, particularly one with long-term prospects, requires careful consideration of tax obligations and their resulting impact on the development of our proposed enterprise. An individual's decision to invest or start a life in another country is ultimately based on knowledge of Double Taxation Treaties and the potential benefits they offer, as well as familiarity with the nation's tax laws at a national level. In order to effectively carry out any project, it is essential to consult with the most up-to-date tax information available. E-Golden can help you identify the best way to proceed based on your specific circumstances, by having specialized and personal service to reduce the risks with the tax burden and, thus, improve your results and income.

services.label: Tax_Planning_and_International_Taxation
services.title: Optimize Your Financial Future with Expert Tax Planning
description: Navigating the complexities of tax regulations can be daunting, but with our professional tax planning services, you can confidently optimize your financial strategy.

On the other side, effective tax planning can also save you significant amounts of money. For that, our team works with you throughout the year to develop tax strategies that optimize your financial situation, reduce your tax liability, and plan for future tax obligations.

We understand that every client has unique financial circumstances. Our personalized tax planning services are tailored to meet your specific needs, ensuring that you benefit from all available tax-saving opportunities.

For business owners, we offer specialized tax planning services that address the unique challenges and opportunities of your industry. Our services include entity selection, tax-efficient structuring, and strategies for growth and succession planning.
E-Golden’s focus is helping individuals and businesses minimize their tax liabilities while ensuring compliance with all relevant laws.

services.label: Corporate_Taxation
services.title: Optimize Your Business Tax Strategy with Expert Corporate Taxation Services
description: Nowadays, international taxation and corporate taxation play a fundamental role in companies’ decision-making.
Knowledge of national legislation, as well as its constant changes, are essential for the proper functioning and success of any business.
Our specialized corporate taxation services are designed to help businesses of all sizes manage their tax obligations effectively and strategically.
With E-golden you can count on the most qualified professionals to support and accompany you throughout this complex journey, with the aim of efficient tax planning for your business.

services.label: Individuals_Taxation
services.title: Simplify Your Taxes with Expert Guidanc
description: Filing taxes can be a complex and time-consuming task. Our individual taxation services are designed to simplify the process and ensure you get the most out of your tax return.
Our team is dedicated to providing personalized and comprehensive tax services that meet your unique needs.

We offer meticulous tax preparation services, ensuring your tax return is accurate and filed on time. Our experts stay updated on the latest tax laws and regulations, ensuring you benefit from all eligible deductions and credits.

For self-employed or a freelancer, E-Golden can provide specialized services to help you manage estimated tax payments, business deductions, and compliance with tax regulations specific to self-employment.

Have questions about your taxes? Our tax consultation service provides you with the answers and advice you need. Whether you have specific tax-related questions or need general guidance, our experts are here to help.

services.label: NHR Consultancy and application submission
services.title: NHR Consultancy and Application Submission
description: Portugal has a non-habitual resident regime for people, which allows individuals to drastically reduce their tax bills by attributing special taxes to certain types of businesses.
With E-golden you will be able to find out the best way to obtain this much-desired regime.

services.label: tax_consultancy_for_athletes_and_artists
services.titleImg: Tax Consultancy for Athletes and artists
services.title: Tax Consultancy for Athletes and Artists
description: Navigating the intricate tax landscape can be particularly challenging for athletes and artists due to their unique income streams and financial situations. Our specialized tax consultancy services are designed to meet the distinct needs of individuals in these professions, ensuring optimal tax management and financial planning.

With E-Golden you can count on a customized tax planning strategies that cater to the fluctuating income and diverse revenue sources typical for athletes and artists. Our goal is to minimize your tax burden while maximizing your financial efficiency.

We also may assist in managing various forms of income, including endorsements, royalties, performance fees, and prize money. Our tax experts ensure accurate reporting and strategic planning to optimize your tax position.

For athletes and artists with international engagements, we provide guidance on cross-border tax issues, including double taxation treaties, foreign tax credits, and compliance with international tax laws.
We offer expert advice on managing and protecting image rights and intellectual property, structuring agreements to maximize tax benefits and comply with legal requirements.

services.label: Real Estate Investments Taxation
services.title: Tax Consultancy for Real Estate Investments
description: Investing in real estate offers significant financial rewards, but it also comes with complex tax implications. Our specialized real estate investments taxation services are designed to help you navigate these complexities, ensuring that you maximize your returns and remain compliant with all tax regulations.

E-Golden can provide strategic tax planning tailored to your real estate investment portfolio. Our experts help you develop tax-efficient strategies for property acquisition, management, and disposition, optimizing your overall tax position.
With us you can receive all the support regarding your Real Estate Investments.

business-solutions.title: Business Solutions
description: You can count on E-golden to provide you with full company services in Portugal, including registration, domiciliation, bank account opening, accounting, tax planning, etc.

details.label: Business Solutions
details.description: In today's dynamic and competitive marketplace, businesses face numerous challenges that require innovative and tailored solutions. Business Solutions Services (BSS) are designed to address these challenges by providing a wide range of strategic, operational, and technological services that help organizations optimize their performance, achieve their goals, and drive sustainable growth. With E-Golden you will be able to achieve your goals faster and more efficiently. To this end, we are committed to providing the necessary services so that you can implement your business in Portugal. Starting with presenting a business plan, advice on the best tax structure for your business, choosing the best legal form for your company, supporting for opening a bank account and specialized accounting services.

services.label: business_advice
services.titleImg: Business Advice – Business plan and tax advice
services.title: Empower Your Business with Expert Business Plan and Tax Strategies
description: Creating a solid business plan and effectively managing taxes are critical components for any successful business. Our comprehensive business advice services are designed to provide you with the guidance needed to drive growth and ensure compliance. With a team of experienced professionals, we offer tailored solutions to meet your specific business needs.
services: Business Plan Development: A robust business plan is essential for the success and growth of your company. We help you define your vision, mission, and strategic objectives, and create a detailed plan that includes market analysis, marketing strategies, financial projections, and operational planning.

Business Plan Review and Optimization: If you already have a business plan, our experts can review it and provide recommendations for improvement. We identify opportunities for growth and fine-tune your plan to ensure it aligns with your business goals and market conditions.

Tax Advice: Navigating the complex tax landscape can be challenging. We provide comprehensive tax advice to ensure your business complies with all tax regulations and takes advantage of all available tax-saving opportunities. Our goal is to minimize your tax burden and maximize your tax efficiency.

Strategic Tax Planning: We develop personalized tax strategies to optimize your company's tax position. This includes analyzing business structures, managing tax credits and incentives, and planning international operations to minimize global tax liabilities.

Business Structuring Advice: We offer guidance on the best legal and operational structure for your business, considering tax implications, liability concerns, and growth objectives. This includes choosing between corporations, limited liability companies, partnerships, and more.

Expansion and Growth Consulting: We provide strategic guidance for business expansion and growth, helping you identify new market opportunities, develop market entry strategies, and plan for sustainable growth.

services.label: company_services
services.title: Company Incorporation and Brand registration
description: Establishing a new company and securing your brand are critical steps in building a successful business. Our comprehensive services for company incorporation and brand registration ensure a smooth and compliant start, providing a solid foundation for your future growth.
With our expert guidance, you can focus on your business while we handle all the necessary needs for your success.
services: Business Entity Selection: Choosing the right business structure is crucial for legal protection, tax benefits, and operational efficiency. We help you determine the most suitable entity type, whether it's a corporation, limited liability company (LLC), partnership, or sole proprietorship, based on your specific business goals and needs.
Company Formation: We manage the entire incorporation process, including preparing and filing all necessary documents with state. Our services ensure that your company is established correctly.
registrations: Trademark Search and Analysis: Before you register your brand, we conduct a comprehensive trademark search to ensure your brand name, logo, or slogan is unique and not infringing on existing trademarks. This step is crucial to avoid legal issues and potential rebranding costs.
Trademark Application Preparation: We prepare and file your trademark application.

Renewal and Maintenance: We assist in the renewal and maintenance of your trademarks, ensuring they remain active and protected over time. Our services include managing renewal deadlines and updating trademark records as needed.

services.label: company_domiciliation
services.title: Establish Your Business with Our Comprehensive Domiciliation Services
description: A prestigious business address can enhance your company's image and provide essential support for your operations. Our company domiciliation services offer you a professional address, mail handling, and administrative support, helping you to establish a credible and efficient presence without the overhead of a physical office.

services.label: bank_account
services.title: Streamline Your Banking Needs with Our Expert Bank Account Opening Services
description: Opening a bank account is a fundamental step for businesses. Our specialized bank account opening services offer you comprehensive support to ensure a smooth and efficient process. Whether you’re looking to establish a corporate account, personal account, or specialized banking services, our team is here to assist you every step of the way.

services.label: accounting
services.title: Expert Accounting Solutions to Drive Your Business Success
description: Effective accounting is the cornerstone of financial stability and growth for any business. Our comprehensive accounting services are designed to provide you with accurate financial insights, ensure compliance with regulations, and optimize your business’s financial performance. Whether you're a small business, startup, or large corporation, our team of dedicated professionals is committed to delivering personalized solutions that meet your specific needs.
services: Bookkeeping Services: We offer reliable bookkeeping services to maintain accurate records of your financial transactions. From daily transactions to month-end reconciliations, we ensure your financial data is organized and up-to-date.

Financial Statement Preparation: Prepare comprehensive financial statements, including balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow statements, to provide you with a clear overview of your business’s financial health.
Budgeting and Forecasting: Develop strategic budgets and financial forecasts to help you plan and achieve your business goals.

Payroll Services: Streamline your payroll process with our payroll services, including calculation of wages, deductions, and tax withholdings. We ensure timely and accurate payroll processing to support your employees.

Financial Analysis and Reporting: Gain valuable insights into your business’s performance with detailed financial analysis and customized reports. We help you interpret financial data to make informed decisions.

Advisory Services: Benefit from strategic financial advice and guidance tailored to your business objectives. Whether you're planning for growth, restructuring, or navigating financial challenges, we provide proactive solutions.

real-estate-investments-management.title: Real Estate Investments and Management
description: With E-golden you can have an integrated real estate solution from the planning stage down to the day-to-day management of properties in Portugal.

details.label: Real Estate Investments and Management
details.description: Investing in real estate can be highly lucrative but also complex, requiring expertise, strategic planning, and meticulous management. E-Golden´s Real Estate Investments and Management Services are designed to guide you maximize returns, minimize risks, and ensure the smooth operation of your real estate assets. Whether you're an individual investor or a corporate entity, our comprehensive suite of services is tailored to meet your unique needs and goals.

services.label: real_estate_investment_planning
services.title: Maximize Your Real Estate Investments with Strategic Planning
description: Real estate investment presents opportunities for wealth creation and portfolio diversification. Our specialized real estate investment planning services are designed to help investors navigate the complexities of the market, optimize returns, and mitigate risks. Whether you're new to real estate investing or a seasoned investor, our team of experts is committed to providing tailored solutions that align with your financial goals.
services: Investment Strategy Development: Develop a personalized investment strategy aligned with your financial objectives, risk tolerance, and timeline. We analyze market trends, conduct feasibility studies, and identify lucrative investment opportunities.

Property Analysis and Due Diligence: Thoroughly evaluate potential investment properties to assess their financial viability and potential returns. We conduct comprehensive due diligence, including property inspections, financial analysis, and market research.

Financial Modeling and Projections: Create detailed financial models and projections to forecast investment performance. We analyze cash flows, return on investment (ROI), and capital appreciation potential to support informed decision-making.

Financing and Capital Structuring: Optimize financing strategies to fund real estate acquisitions. We advise on mortgage options, leverage ratios, and capital structuring to maximize returns and minimize financial risks.
Tax Planning and Optimization: Develop tax-efficient strategies to minimize tax liabilities associated with real estate investments.

Market Research and Trends Analysis: Stay informed with comprehensive market research and analysis. We track local and national real estate trends, identify emerging opportunities, and provide insights to capitalize on market dynamics.

Exit Strategy Planning: Develop exit strategies tailored to your investment goals and market conditions. Whether you're considering property disposition, refinancing, or portfolio diversification, we help you navigate the best exit options.

services.label: property_search_services
services.title: Find Your Ideal Property with Our Comprehensive Property Search Services
description: Searching for the perfect property can be daunting, whether it’s for investment, rental, or personal use. Our dedicated property search services are designed to simplify the process, providing you with expert guidance and access to a wide range of properties that match your specific criteria. Whether you're looking for residential, commercial, or investment properties, our team is committed to helping you find the right property efficiently and effectively.
services: Personalized Property Consultation: We begin with a detailed consultation to understand your property requirements, budget, location preferences, and investment goals. This helps us tailor our search to match your unique criteria.
Market Analysis and Property Valuation: Receive detailed market analysis and property valuations to assess the potential value and investment feasibility of properties of interest.

Property Inspections and Due Diligence: Arrange property viewings and inspections based on your preferences. We conduct thorough due diligence, including property inspections, legal checks, and documentation review, to ensure transparency and peace of mind.

Negotiation and Purchase Assistance: Benefit from expert negotiation skills to secure the best terms and price for your chosen property. We assist throughout the purchase process, from making offers to navigating counteroffers and closing the deal.

services.label: Real_Estate_Management_services
services.title: Efficiently Manage Your Real Estate Investments with Our Comprehensive Management Services
description: Managing real estate assets requires expertise, dedication, and a strategic approach to maximize returns and minimize risks. Our specialized real estate management services are designed to help property owners, investors, and landlords effectively oversee their portfolios. Whether you own residential, commercial, or mixed-use properties, our team is committed to delivering personalized solutions that optimize property performance and enhance value.
services: Property Operations and Maintenance: We oversee day-to-day property operations, including maintenance, repairs, and tenant communications. Our proactive approach ensures properties are well-maintained and tenants are satisfied.

Tenant Acquisition and Relations: Attract quality tenants through targeted marketing strategies and thorough tenant screening processes. We manage lease negotiations, tenant onboarding, and foster positive tenant relations to minimize vacancies and maximize occupancy rates.

Rent Collection and Financial Reporting: Ensure timely rent collection and streamline financial processes with our rent collection services. We provide detailed financial reporting, including income statements, expense reports, and budget analysis.

Lease Administration and Compliance: Handle lease administration tasks, including lease drafting, renewals, and compliance with lease terms and regulations. We ensure all legal and regulatory requirements are met to protect property owners' interests.

Property Marketing and Vacancy Management: Implement effective marketing strategies to attract potential tenants and minimize vacancy periods. We conduct market analysis, advertise vacancies, and manage property showings to quickly fill vacancies.
